summary: A collection of utility routines that support online feature store backends, handling entity key serialization, generation of backend‑specific keys (e.g., Redis keys and prefixes), conversion of timestamps to naive UTC, deterministic entity identifier computation via hashing, and creation of an online store instance from a configuration object.
business_intent: Enable applications to interact with online feature stores efficiently by abstracting low‑level key encoding, timestamp handling, and store instantiation, thereby simplifying feature retrieval at serving time.
